title: The Rise and Fall of a Rock Star CEO
description:
He was the powerful executive in charge of one of the world's biggest automakers. Now, Carlos Ghosn is under arrest in Japan for financial misconduct. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Detroit bureau chief on Ghosn's triumphed rise to power and scandalous fall from grace. 
FOLLOW UP
 David's latest report: This Could Be A Catastrophic Ending For Carlos Ghosn
You can follow David at: @DavidWelchBN
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!

itunes:subtitle: with David Welch (Bloomberg News)
